entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Canora
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
